import IconTooltip from './';

# IconTooltip

<Canvas>
  <Story name="default">
    <IconTooltip content="Some text" />
  </Story>
</Canvas>

<Canvas>
  <Story name="With JSX element">
    <IconTooltip content={<div>A div with some text</div>} />
  </Story>
</Canvas>

<Canvas>
  <Story name="Fixed bottom placement">
    <IconTooltip content="Some text" placement="bottom" />
  </Story>
</Canvas>

<Props of={IconTooltip} />
